ocean.question: I have a big mouth, but I cannot speak. I swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🎣 Some people try to catch me with a fishing pole.
🐟 I am a type of animal that lives in the sea.
💦 I breathe underwater with gills.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue. Ships sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have waves that crash on the shore.
🐳 Many animals live inside me.
🚢 Boats need me to travel far.

ocean.question: I'm a home for a crab, but I'm not a house. I'm found on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I can be found in many different shapes and colors.
🦀 Some animals live inside me or use me for protection.
🚶 You might step on me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
⚫ I can change color and squirt black ink.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and can walk very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile that spends most of its time in the ocean.
🥕 I love to eat plants.
🏖️ I lay my eggs on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm long and thin, and I can give you a shock under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I use electricity to defend myself.
🐠 I am a type of fish.
🐍 I have a similar shape to a snake.

ocean.question: I am a very large sea creature, known for singing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.
🎶 I communicate with complex sounds and songs.

ocean.question: I have five arms, but I am not a person. I live at the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 My shape is similar to a star.
🌊 I live in the saltwater.
🖐️ I have radial symmetry.

ocean.question: I am a predator with many teeth, and I'm known as the king of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a fish that doesn't have bones.
🌊 I can be very scary.
🐟 Many movies are made about me!

ocean.question: I am a giant and slow creature, filter feeding on plankton, and having the biggest mouth in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a type of shark, but I don't eat big fish.
🌊 I have spots all over my body.
🐟 I'm harmless to humans.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal
🥜 I'm known to eat a lot of peanuts at the zoo
💧 I use my trunk to spray water

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I purr when I'm happy
🥛 I like to drink milk
🧶 I love to play with yarn

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet
🥚 I lay eggs
🌾 I eat plants and insects in the water

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. I am a good friend. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to fetch sticks
🏡 I protect your house
🐾 I have four legs and bark

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse
🍃 I eat grass
🦓 My stripes help me hide in the tall grass

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears
🌱 I like to eat green things
🐰 I can be found in a garden or a burrow

animal.question: I roar very loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane
🍖 I am a carnivore
🦁 I live in Africa and hunt for food

animal.question: I am green and I love to catch flies with my long tongue. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I can jump very far
💧 I like to live near water
🐛 I eat insects

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth
🌍 I live in Africa
🌿 I use my long neck to reach high branches

animal.question: I am a bear with black and white fur, and I eat bamboo. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I am from China
🎋 I love to eat bamboo shoots
🐻 My fur is very striking and easy to identify.
